_description: Feature Consistency System Configuration - Development Environment

warmup_trim_days.description: Number of days to trim from start to remove indicator warm-up period

nan_drop_threshold_per_symbol.description: Maximum NaN ratio allowed per symbol (0.10 = 10%)
nan_drop_threshold_per_symbol.environment_note: More lenient threshold for development with limited data

global_feature_keep_ratio.description: Minimum symbol coverage required to keep feature globally (0.90 = 90%)
global_feature_keep_ratio.environment_note: Lower threshold to retain more features for testing

min_symbol_feature_coverage.description: Minimum feature coverage required to include symbol (0.80 = 80%)
min_symbol_feature_coverage.environment_note: Lower threshold to include more symbols for development

use_missingness_mask.description: Whether to create _isnan columns for missing value indicators

imputation_strategy.environment_note: Zero imputation for consistent development behavior

imputation_value.description: Value to use for final imputation when strategy is 'zero'

manifest_path.description: Path to save/load feature manifest JSON file

detailed_logging.description: Enable detailed logging of processing decisions
detailed_logging.environment_note: Full logging enabled for development analysis

rules.imputation_strategy: Must be one of: zero, mean, median
rules.log_level: Must be one of: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
